product_name: KAVU Keeper Shoulder Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's KAVU Keeper Shoulder Bag is a keeper for sure, for its looks, feel and ability to keep your life's little necessities organized. Cotton-canvas shoulder bag comes in solid colors with a contrasting top band, or an all-over pattern. Deep main compartment snaps closed to secure personal items. External zippered pocket and 2 external stash pockets with rip-and-stick closures provide additional storage. Adjustable webbing strap is long enough to fit comfortably over your shoulder or across the body. Closeout.
short_description: The women's KAVU Keeper Shoulder Bag is a keeper for sure, for its looks, feel and ability to keep your life's little necessities organized.
